title: Amazon online arbitrage
job_overview:
Looking for a talented VA with past experience in working with US based Amazon selling or someone who is highly motivated and eager to learn
are seeking a long-term employee who is good at problem solving.
Your role would include:
-Sourcing products for Online Arbitrage using and manually searching
-Using google sheets to record leads
Prefer past experience with the following:
-Keepa (Required)
-SellerAmp (Preferred)
-Put apple in the title of your response to the job
-Amazon Seller Central (Preferred)
-Knowledge of Sales Rank (Preferred)
-You must have a good stable internet connection
Benefits:
-Flexible work schedule - It does not matter when you do the work as long as it is done
-Bi-weekly payment
-Flexible time off if requested
Look forward to hearing from you and hope to work together soon.
The Online arbitrage store does over 8 million a year in revenue
At the bottom of your application add 3 leads
-Must have buy cost, Amazon link, and source link
-any coupon that was used
(If never souced before put your age and why you want to learn at the bottom)
